alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 03 at 3:39PM MST until November 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures between 24 and 30 degrees expected. * WHERE...Most areas across central and northern Arizona, including northern Gila County and the Verde Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
